compute_stats(l_files, etuvar, l_files_input)

Compute statistics.

Parameters

  • etuvar (str) – Calibrated SSH variable name.

Return type

None

compute_stats_by_regime(l_files, etuvar, l_files_inputs, regime_type='all')

Compute statistics by regime.

Parameters

  • l_files (list) – List of SWOT track files.

  • etuvar (str) – Calibrated SSH variable name.

  • l_files_input (list) – List of input files.

  • regime_type (string) – Name of the regime type, ‘all’ for all regime types computed at once.

Return type

None
